Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Wide goblet with a ring base, restricted mouth and simple lip, made from a fine pink clay. Two incised horizontal lines accentuate the location of the equatorial diametre on the exterior surface, which also bears a geometrical pattern painted in white. The latter is found directly below the lip and is comprised of two series of three vertical lines and two series of small superposed horizontal lines, both motifs alternate all around the circumference of the vase.
